text: Consuelo Moure (1947 - 2 April 2014) was a Spanish-born Colombian actress. She was known for her roles in Nochebuena, Pena m치xima, La esquina, Tres hombres y tres mujeres, Es mejor ser rico que pobre and in Champagne. She was born in Pamplona.
